line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: Fletcher is a similarly conscientious character.
sentences.chinese: 弗莱彻的风格也是类似，踢得兢兢业业。

sentences.english: He shows great assiduity in all his work.
sentences.chinese: 他对所有工作都兢兢业业。

sentences.english: And he workedhard as a New York City firefighter.
sentences.chinese: 作为纽约市一名消防员，丹尼斯工作兢兢业业。

sentences.english: For decades, he has been cautious and conscientious towards work.
sentences.chinese: 几十年来，他对工作一直兢兢业业，一丝不苟。

definition: making an all-out effort (idiom); to try one's heart out/to do one's utmost
obscure and unknown (idiom); an outsider without any reputation/a nobody/an unknown quantity
(to play) one's part/one's role/one's duty/(to stay within) one's bounds/dutiful/keeping to one's role
self-restraint and devotion to public duties (idiom); selfless dedication/to serve the public interest wholeheartedly
to bend to a task and spare no effort (idiom); striving to the utmost
